Please summarize this text. Corporations often strive to reduce costs while still producing quality products. In order to do so, they must find ways to streamline their manufacturing processes and optimize their operations. One way to do this is to introduce automation technology into their factories. Automation enables corporations to produce a higher quality product at a lower cost, since robots operate more accurately and efficiently than humans.

Breakthroughs such as self-driving cars and facial recognition are simply a result of the power of deep learning.
